about_the_game:
《Dream》is a game that includes exploration and decryption.
The astronaut is lost in outer space, he wants to return home, all the confusing scenes, is this a dream or another world?
In psychedelic scene you need to discover and explore objects that can interactive with each other, and try to move to the next level.
Avoid dangerous traps,avoid falling injury......

Pay attention to you oxygen value, without oxygen will reduce health.
When you have oxygen will restore health.
Hint: you can stay at oxygen area for think deeply, or quickly explore location places.

After purchasing, you will receive a complete experience without any internal purchases.
The game lasts about 1.5 hours.

Author: DreamRZ
E-mail: DreamRL@live.com

《Dream》is a game that includes exploration and decryption.
The astronaut is lost in outer space, he wants to return home, all the confusing scenes, is this a dream or another world?
In psychedelic scene you need to discover and explore objects that can interactive with each other, and try to move to the next level.

name: Dream celestial body

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 470 / AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 320 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Astronauts want to go home, begin fantasy adventure
